text:
(1) Lumbering on Staten Island: Loading a truck with newly cut logs, Richmond Avenue, Eltingville.

P. L. Sperr

(2) Another view on the same job location,

P. L. Sperr

Spring, 1924
title: Lumbering on Staten Island.

title: Lumbering on Staten Island.

text:
(1)
Lumbering on Staten Island: A truckload of logs from the woods of Eltingville, destined for the copper smelters of Perth Amboy, N.J.
Summer 1924.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
Loading oak at Eltingville for transhipment to the Standard Oil Co. docks in Venezuela.

P. L. Sperr.

(3)
Near Richmond Avenue at Eltingville.

P. L. Sperr.

Summer 1924.
title: Lumbering on Staten Island.

Richmond Avenue, Eltingville, S.I., N.Y. [R.R. crossing, station, train at platform, old car stopped by tracks, "Reid's" soda-drug-ice cream store on street]
